sentences.en: Because it is carried by a dominant gene, an affected individual can expect about half of his or her children to inherit the illness.
sentences.cn: 因为它是由显性基因携带，所以感染者的孩子会有约50％的可能性遗传该疾病。

sentences.en: By cross-breeding with our native red deer, the sika deer have affected the gene pool.
sentences.cn: 通过与我们本地的赤鹿杂交，梅花鹿的基因库已经发生了改变。

sentences.en: Evidence is accumulating that a defective gene may be responsible for this disease.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的证据表明该疾病是由一种有缺陷的基因引起的.
吉恩在拍卖会上作文书工作。

sentences.en: Gene mutations are alterations in the DNA code.
sentences.cn: 基因突变是指DNA密码的改变.

sentences.en: Girls in an affected family can also be tested to see if they carry the defective gene.
sentences.cn: 染病家庭的女孩们也可以检查一下，看看是否携带这种缺陷基因。

sentences.en: He found evidence of mutated forms of the gene.
sentences.cn: 他找到了该基因出现了变异形式的证据。

sentences.en: If the gene is present, a human embryo will go on to develop as a male.
sentences.cn: 如果这种基因存在，人类胚胎就会发育为男性。

sentences.en: It is far too early to make sweeping statements about gene therapy.
sentences.cn: 现在对基因疗法下结论还为时过早。

sentences.en: Now, the gene they discovered today doesn't account for all those cases.
sentences.cn: 不过，他们现在发现的基因无法解释所有的病例。

sentences.en: Sickle-cell anaemia is passed on through a recessive gene.
sentences.cn: 镰状细胞贫血通过隐性基因遗传给后代。

sentences.en: The gene is only part of the causation of illness.
sentences.cn: 基因只是致病的部分原因。

sentences.en: the genes that regulate cell division
The project is nothing less than mapping every gene sequence in the human body.
sentences.cn: 这个项目就是要绘制人体所有基因序列的图谱。

sentences.en: We can use genetic engineering techniques to isolate the gene that is responsible.
sentences.cn: 我们可以使用基因工程技术把相关基因分离出来。

sentences.en: You also owe a nod to your leptin gene.

phrases.tran_cn: 基因缺失；基因删除（多余基因的除去）
基因流，基因流动；基因怜
基因重组；基因重组现象
基因导入，转基因；基因转移

trans.tran_en: a part of a cell in a living thing that controls what it looks like, how it grows, and how it develops. People get their genes from their parents
